en.class_help: The class name of the window to be run.
en.focus_help: Focus the window and switch to its present workspace.
en.height_help:
If using --floating: set the height of the window.
Enter percentage value without % sign.
en.width_help:
If using --width: set the width of the window.
Enter percentage value without % sign.

cn.focus_help: 聚焦窗口置于前台并切换到其当前工作区。
cn.height_help:
如果使用--floating：设置窗口的高度。
输入百分比值时不带%符号。
cn.width_help:
如果使用--floating：设置窗口的宽度。
输入百分比值时不带%符号。
